snippet: The month-long program, running from April 27 through May 27 at the Museum of the Moving Image, will honor the innovative character skits and comedy pieces of Ernie Kovacs and Edie Adams and emphasize their work as a team.
abstract: The month-long program, running from April 27 through May 27 at the Museum of the Moving Image, will honor the innovative character skits and comedy pieces of Ernie Kovacs and Edie Adams and emphasize their work as a team.

headline.main: Retrospective on Ernie Kovacs and Edie Adams Coming to Museum of the Moving Image
headline.print_headline: Museum Plans Program On Kovacs and Adams
